Class Translation

A translation string with a fluent API to customise it.

System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException

| Improve this Doc View Source

Default(String)

Replace the text if it's null or empty. If you set a null or empty value, the translation will show the fallback "no translation" placeholder (see UsePlaceholder(Boolean) if you want to disable that). Returns a new instance if changed.

Declaration
public Translation Default(string default)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String default

The default value.
Returns

| Improve this Doc View Source

Tokens(Object)

Replace tokens in the text like {{value}} with the given values. Returns a new instance.

Declaration
public Translation Tokens(object tokens)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Object tokens

An object containing token key/value pairs. This can be an anonymous object (like new { value = 42, name = "Cranberries" }), a dictionary, or a class instance.
Returns
Type Description
Translation
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The tokens argument is null.
| Improve this Doc View Source

ToString()

Get the translation text. Calling this method isn't strictly necessary, since you can assign a Translation value directly to a string.

UsePlaceholder(Boolean)

Whether to return a "no translation" placeholder if the translation is null or empty. Returns a new instance.
